comment: барка на вывеску Адептус Амасекус, скиллчек Лор: Империум

languages.text: Ржавая вывеска с неровной надписью "Адептус Амасекус" неловко накренилась, будто бы опьянев. Под густым слоем копоти, грязи и древней краски проступают глубокие царапины и вмятины.

traits.locale_text: Ржавая вывеска с неровной надписью "Адептус Амасекус" неловко накренилась, будто бы опьянев. Под густым слоем копоти, грязи и древней краски проступают глубокие царапины и вмятины.

languages.text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.
languages.original_text: Ржавая вывеска с неровной надписью "Адептус Амасекус" неловко накренилась, будто бы опьянев. Под густым слоем копоти, грязи и древней краски проступают глубокие царапины и вмятины.

traits.locale_text: A rusty sign with the jagged word "Adeptus Amasecus" is tilted awkwardly, as if it is drunk. Under a thick layer of soot, dirt and ancient paint, deep scratches and dents are visible.
The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.
The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.
The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

languages.text: 錆びついた看板には『アデプトゥス・アマセック』という言葉が歪んだ文字で刻まれており、厚い煤、汚れ、古い塗料の下には深い傷やへこみが見える。
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: 錆びついた看板には『アデプトゥス・アマセック』という言葉が歪んだ文字で刻まれており、厚い煤、汚れ、古い塗料の下には深い傷やへこみが見える。

languages.text: Le panneau, planté de travers, est couvert de rouille et on peut y lire dans une écriture hésitante : « Adeptus Amasecus ». Sous l'épaisse couche de suie, de poussière et de peinture écaillée, on discerne de profondes éraflures et bosselures.
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: Le panneau, planté de travers, est couvert de rouille et on peut y lire dans une écriture hésitante : « Adeptus Amasecus ». Sous l'épaisse couche de suie, de poussière et de peinture écaillée, on discerne de profondes éraflures et bosselures.

languages.text: 锈迹斑斑的招牌上用参差不齐的字体写着“艾玛赛克烈酒修会”，看起来歪歪斜斜，像是喝醉了一样。招牌上蒙着厚厚的烟灰和污垢，以及不知多久之前刷的油漆，上面能看到深深的划痕和凹痕。
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: 锈迹斑斑的招牌上用参差不齐的字体写着“艾玛赛克烈酒修会”，看起来歪歪斜斜，像是喝醉了一样。招牌上蒙着厚厚的烟灰和污垢，以及不知多久之前刷的油漆，上面能看到深深的划痕和凹痕。

languages.text: El letrero oxidado, con las palabras «Adeptus Amasecus» escritas con letra irregular, se encuentra claramente torcido. Bajo una gruesa capa de hollín, suciedad y pintura antigua, se aprecian profundos arañazos y abolladuras.
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: El letrero oxidado, con las palabras «Adeptus Amasecus» escritas con letra irregular, se encuentra claramente torcido. Bajo una gruesa capa de hollín, suciedad y pintura antigua, se aprecian profundos arañazos y abolladuras.

languages.text: Das rostige Schild, auf dem in zackiger Schrift die Worte "Adeptus Amasecus" stehen, hängt trunken schief. Unter einer dicken Schicht aus Ruß, Schmutz und uralter Farbe sind tiefe Kratzer und Dellen zu sehen.
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: Das rostige Schild, auf dem in zackiger Schrift die Worte "Adeptus Amasecus" stehen, hängt trunken schief. Unter einer dicken Schicht aus Ruß, Schmutz und uralter Farbe sind tiefe Kratzer und Dellen zu sehen.

languages.text: Sivri uçlu harflerle yazılan "Adeptus Amasekus" sözcükleriyle süslenmiş paslı tabela, sarhoşmuş gibi yamuk duruyor. Kalın is, kir ve fi tarihinden kalma boya katmanlarının altındaki derin çizik ve oyuklar görülebiliyor.
languages.original_text: The rusty sign, emblazoned with the words "Adeptus Amasecus" in jagged lettering, is drunkenly askew. Deep scratches and dents are visible under a thick layer of soot, dirt, and ancient paint.

traits.locale_text: Paslı levha çentikli harflerle yazılan "Adeptus Amasekus" sözcükleriyle süslenmiş ve sarhoş gibi eğik duruyor. Kalın is, kir ve çok eskiden kalma boya tabakalarının altında derin çizikler ve oyuklar görülebiliyor.
